extends MutualExclusionSolver
implements LatProcConstraints, LatProcBuffConstraints

        The index of producer and consumers of the channel depend on the order of start times. Generate constraints to decide on this order.
        Parameters:
        srcActor - source actor of the channel
        dstActor - sink actor of the channel
        idxName - name of the index
        srcRepCount - repetition count of source actor
